SEARCH
程序包 si.display

类 MenuListener

java.lang.Object
si.display.MenuListener
所有已实现的接口:
KeyListener, EventListener, ucd.comp2011j.engine.MenuCommands
public class MenuListener extends Object implements ucd.comp2011j.engine.MenuCommands, KeyListener
The MenuListener class implements KeyListener and MenuCommands to handle keyboard input for menu navigation in the Asteroids game. It tracks the state of keys associated with menu options.
